title: For Sale 1888 R & S Die Cut Detriots National League
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: For Sale 1888 R & S Die Cut Detriots National League
posts.post_content:
I have for sale ($50) a 1888 R & S Die Cut (Detriots National League).  It is in real nice shape with no creases and fantastic gloss.  Will look nice in an SGC holder and will grade-out nicely.  Price includes shipping (paypal, check, money order all work for me).

Here is a point of reference on these...

[url]http://www.oldcardboard.com/n/r&s-die-cuts/r&s-die-cuts.asp?cardsetID=685[/url]

[IMG]http://app4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture_1034.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://app4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/picture2_1931_1267823188.jpg[/IMG]

Lovely Day...
